description: Data Dictionary for REopt Lite Inputs

user_uuid.description: The assigned unique ID of a signed in REOpt user

time_steps_per_hour.description: The number of time steps per hour in the REopt simulation

timeout_seconds.description: The number of seconds allowed before the optimization times out

description.description: An optional user defined description to describe the scenario and run

latitude.description: The approximate latitude of the site in decimal degrees

longitude.description: The approximate longitude of the site in decimal degrees

land_acres.description: Land area in acres available for PV panel siting

address.description: A user defined address as optional metadata (street address, city, state or zip code)

roof_squarefeet.description: Area of roof in square feet available for PV siting

escalation_pct.description: Annual nominal utility electricity cost escalation rate

value_of_lost_load_us_dollars_per_kwh.description: Value placed on unmet site load during grid outages. Units are US dollars per unmet kilowatt-hour. The value of lost load (VoLL) is used to determine the avoided outage costs by multiplying VoLL [$/kWh] with the average number of hours that the critical load can be met by the energy system (determined by simulating outages occuring at every hour of the year), and multiplying by the mean critical load.

microgrid_upgrade_cost_pct.description: Additional cost, in percent of non-islandable capital costs, to make a distributed energy system islandable from the grid and able to serve critical loads. Includes all upgrade costs such as additional laber and critical load panels.

om_cost_escalation_pct.description: Annual nominal O&M cost escalation rate

add_blended_rates_to_urdb_rate.description: Set to 'true' to add the monthly blended energy rates and demand charges to the URDB rate schedule. Otherwise, blended rates will only be considered if a URDB rate is not provided.

wholesale_rate_us_dollars_per_kwh.description: Price of electricity sold back to the grid in absence of net metering or above net metering limit, restricted to total site load

interconnection_limit_kw.description: Limit on system capacity size that can be interconnected to the grid

wholesale_rate_above_site_load_us_dollar.description: Price of electricity sold back to the grid above the site load, regardless of net metering

urdb_response.description: Utility rate structure from Utility Rate Database API

blended_annual_demand_charges_us_dollars.description: Annual blended demand rates (annual demand charge cost in $ divided by annual peak demand in kW)

blended_annual_rates_us_dollars_per_kwh.description: Annual blended energy rate (total annual energy in kWh divided by annual cost in $)

net_metering_limit_kw.description: System size above which net metering is not allowed

blended_monthly_demand_charges_us_dollar.description: Array (length of 12) of blended demand charges (demand charge cost in $ divided by monthly peak demand in kW)

urdb_utility_name.description: Name of Utility from Utility Rate Database

urdb_label.description: Label attribute of utility rate structure from Utility Rate Database API

urdb_rate_name.description: Name of utility rate from Utility Rate Database

blended_monthly_rates_us_dollars_per_kwh.description: Array (length of 12) of blended energy rates (total monthly energy in kWh divided by monthly cost in $)

critical_load_pct.description: Critical load factor is multiplied by the typical load to determine the critical load that must be met during an outage. Value must be between zero and one, inclusive.

outage_start_hour.description: Hour of year that grid outage starts. Must be less than outage_end.

outage_end_hour.description: Hour of year that grid outage ends. Must be greater than outage_start.

monthly_totals_kwh.description: Array (length of 12) of total monthly energy consumption used to scale simulated building load profile.

year.description: Year of Custom Load Profile. If a custom load profile is uploaded via the loads_kw parameter, it is important that this year correlates with the load profile so that weekdays/weekends are determined correctly for the utility rate tariff. If a DOE Reference Building profile (aka simulated profile) is used, the year is set to 2017 since the DOE profiles start on a Sunday.

loads_kw.description: Typical load over all hours in one year. Must be hourly (8,760 samples), 30 minute (17,520 samples), or 15 minute (35,040 samples).

outage_is_major_event.description: Boolean value for if outage is a major event, which affects the avoided_outage_costs_us_dollars. If True, the avoided outage costs are calculated for a single outage occurring in the first year of the analysis_years. If False, the outage event is assumed to be an average outage event that occurs every year of the analysis period. In the latter case, the avoided outage costs for one year are escalated and discounted using the escalation_pct and offtaker_discount_pct to account for an annually recurring outage. (Average outage durations for certain utility service areas can be estimated using statistics reported on EIA form 861.)

critical_loads_kw_is_net.description: If there is existing PV, must specify whether provided load is the net load after existing PV or not.

loads_kw_is_net.description: If there is existing PV, must specify whether provided load is the net load after existing PV or not.

annual_kwh.description: Annual energy consumption used to scale simulated building load profile, if monthly_totals_kwh is not provided.

doe_reference_name.description: Simulated load profile from DOE Commercial Reference Buildings

critical_loads_kw.description: Critical load during an outage period. Must be hourly (8,760 samples), 30 minute (17,520 samples), or 15 minute (35,040 samples).

pbi_years.description: Duration of production-based incentives from installation date

macrs_bonus_pct.description: Percent of upfront project costs to depreciate in year one in addition to scheduled depreciation

state_rebate_us_dollars_per_kw.description: State rebate based on installed capacity

max_kw.description: Maximum PV size constraint for optimization. Set to zero to disable PV

gcr.description: PV ground cover ratio (photovoltaic array area : total ground area).

federal_itc_pct.description: Percentage of capital costs that are credited towards federal taxes

pbi_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum annual value of production-based incentives

module_type.description: PV module type (0: Standard; 1: Premium; 2: Thin Film)

array_type.description: PV Watts array type (0: Ground Mount Fixed (Open Rack); 1: Rooftop, Fixed; 2: Ground Mount 1-Axis Tracking; 3 : 1-Axis Backtracking; 4: Ground Mount, 2-Axis Tracking)

state_ibi_pct.description: Percentage of capital costs offset by state incentives

utility_ibi_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum dollar value of utility percentage-based capital cost incentive

om_cost_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Annual PV operations and maintenance costs in $/kW

utility_rebate_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Utility rebate based on installed capacity

min_kw.description: Minimum PV size constraint for optimization

macrs_itc_reduction.description: Percent of the ITC value by which depreciable basis is reduced

degradation_pct.description: Annual rate of degradation in PV energy production

federal_rebate_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Federal rebates based on installed capacity

pbi_system_max_kw.description: Maximum system size eligible for production-based incentive

macrs_option_years.description: Duration over which accelerated depreciation will occur. Set to zero to disable

radius.description: Radius to use when searching for the closest climate data station. Use zero to use the closest station regardless of the distance

utility_ibi_pct.description: Percentage of capital costs offset by utility incentives

state_ibi_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum dollar value of state percentage-based capital cost incentive

total_rebate_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Rebate based on installed power capacity

max_kwh.description: Maximum battery energy storage capacity constraint for optimization. Set to zero to disable Storage

total_itc_pct.description: Total investment tax credit in percent applied toward capital costs

min_kw.description: Minimum battery power capacity size constraint for optimization

max_kw.description: Maximum battery power capacity size constraint for optimization. Set to zero to disable storage

replace_cost_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Battery power capacity replacement cost at time of replacement year

replace_cost_us_dollars_per_kwh.description: Battery energy capacity replacement cost at time of replacement year

min_kwh.description: Minimum battery energy storage capacity constraint for optimization

installed_cost_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Total upfront battery power capacity costs (e.g. inverter and balance of power systems)

battery_replacement_year.description: Number of years from start of analysis period to replace battery

macrs_itc_reduction.description: Percent of the ITC value by which depreciable basis is reduced

canGridCharge.description: Flag to set whether the battery can be charged from the grid, or just onsite generation

macrs_bonus_pct.description: Percent of upfront project costs to depreciate under MACRS in year one in addtion to scheduled depreciation

inverter_replacement_year.description: Number of years from start of analysis period to replace inverter

macrs_option_years.description: Duration over which accelerated depreciation will occur. Set to zero by default

internal_efficiency_pct.description: Battery inherent efficiency independent of inverter and rectifier

soc_min_pct.description: Minimum allowable battery state of charge

soc_init_pct.description: Battery state of charge at first hour of optimization

pbi_years.description: Duration of production-based incentives from installation date

macrs_bonus_pct.description: Percent of upfront project costs to depreciate under MACRS

max_kw.description: Maximum wind power capacity constraint for optimization. Set to zero to disable Wind. Enabled by default

pbi_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility production-based incentives

wind_meters_per_sec.description: Data downloaded from Wind ToolKit for modeling wind turbine.

state_ibi_pct.description: Percent of upfront project costs to discount under state investment based incentives

utility_rebate_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility rebates

installed_cost_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Total upfront installed costs in US dollars per kW. Determined by size_class. For the 'large' (>2MW) size_class the cost is $1,874/kW. For the 'medium commercial' size_class the cost is $4,111 per kW. For the 'small commercial' size_class the cost is $4,989 per kW and for the 'residential' size_class the cost is $10,792 per kW

utility_ibi_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility investment based incentives

pressure_atmospheres.description: Data downloaded from Wind ToolKit for modeling wind turbine.

pbi_system_max_kw.description: Maximum system size for which production-based incentives apply

utility_ibi_pct.description: Percent of upfront project costs to discount under utility investment based incentives

state_ibi_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum rebate allowed under state investment based incentives

wind_direction_degrees.description: Data downloaded from Wind ToolKit for modeling wind turbine.

size_class.description: Turbine size-class. One of [residential, commercial, medium, large]

state_rebate_us_dollars_per_kw.description: State rebates based on installed capacity

macrs_option_years.description: MACRS schedule for financial analysis. Set to zero to disable

state_rebate_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum rebate allowed under state rebates

temperature_celsius.description: Data downloaded from Wind ToolKit for modeling wind turbine.

om_cost_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Total annual operations and maintenance costs for wind

utility_rebate_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Utility rebates based on installed capacity

min_kw.description: Minimum wind power capacity constraint for optimization

macrs_itc_reduction.description: Percent of the full ITC that depreciable basis is reduced by

federal_rebate_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Federal rebate based on installed capacity

pbi_years.description: Duration of production-based incentives from installation date

macrs_bonus_pct.description: Percent of upfront project costs to depreciate under MACRS

om_cost_us_dollars_per_kwh.description: diesel generator per unit production (variable) operations and maintenance costs in $/kWh

max_kw.description: Maximum diesel generator size constraint for optimization. Set to zero to disable gen

pbi_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility production-based incentives

state_ibi_pct.description: Percent of upfront project costs to discount under state investment based incentives

fuel_intercept_gal_per_hr.description: Generator fuel consumption curve y-intercept in gallons per hour.

generator_only_runs_during_grid_outage.description: If there is existing diesel generator, must specify whether it should run only during grid outage or all the time in the bau case.

utility_rebate_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility rebates

utility_ibi_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility investment based incentives

fuel_avail_gal.description: On-site generator fuel available in gallons.

min_turn_down_pct.description: Minimum generator loading in percent of capacity (size_kw).

pbi_system_max_kw.description: Maximum system size for which production-based incentives apply

utility_ibi_pct.description: Percent of upfront project costs to discount under utility investment based incentives

state_ibi_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum rebate allowed under state investment based incentives

fuel_slope_gal_per_kwh.description: Generator fuel burn rate in gallons/kWh.

state_rebate_us_dollars_per_kw.description: State rebates based on installed capacity

macrs_option_years.description: MACRS schedule for financial analysis. Set to zero to disable

state_rebate_max_us_dollars.description: Maximum rebate allowed under state rebates

om_cost_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Annual diesel generator fixed operations and maintenance costs in $/kW

utility_rebate_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Utility rebates based on installed capacity

min_kw.description: Minimum diesel generator size constraint for optimization

macrs_itc_reduction.description: Percent of the full ITC that depreciable basis is reduced by

federal_rebate_us_dollars_per_kw.description: Federal rebate based on installed capacity

generator_sells_energy_back_to_grid.description: If there is existing diesel generator, must specify whether it should run only during grid outage or all the time in the bau case.
